item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, May 7, 2025 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:

20. Tabular (YC S24) Is Hiring ( | hide)

25. Alignment is not free: How model upgrades can silence your confidence signals (96 points | 39 comments)
26. VVVVVV Source Code (369 points | 67 comments)
27. Gemini 2.5 Pro Preview (658 points | 628 comments)
28. Bloat is still software's biggest vulnerability (2024) (219 points | 153 comments)
29. DoorDash to acquire Deliveroo (163 points | 281 comments)
